snippet: BERDON--Barbara Guggenheimer, of Scarsdale on June 11, 2016. Loving mother to Sharon Kristol (Todd Kristol), Allison Berwitz (Joshua Berwitz). Cherished grandmother to Zachary and Julia Kristol, Jacob and Hailey Berwitz. Funeral service Tuesday, June 14 at 11:30am at Westchester Reform Temple, Scarsdale, NY. 1/3
